fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Disintegrate a player in the day phase.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A Disintegrated player's role and last will will not be publicly revealed.
- You will learn the role and last will of the Disintegrated player.
- You may only cast Disintegrate once.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the adventurers.
